title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Design and Application of Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL) Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles and design frameworks of CSCL tools and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can design procedures to evaluate the effectiveness of CSCL modules using mixed research methods (experimental and qualitative analysis).

Design one CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning)-based collaborative learning module suitable for social studies contexts (e.g., history, politics, economics topics) and submit a prototype with core functions (task allocation, discussion board, feedback system) implemented via Figma or similar prototyping tools within six months.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
